trans-unit.source: Iterates over all descendant nodes according to the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"></xref> descendant axis rules.
trans-unit.target: Scorre tutti i nodi discendenti in base al <xref href="System.Xml.XPath"> </xref> regole dell'asse discendente.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> that identifies the node from which you start traversing descendants.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>che identifica il nodo da cui iniziare l'attraversamento dei discendenti.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"></xref> class, which enables you to filter nodes based on the name.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <xref href="System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XmlNavigatorFilter"> </xref> (classe), che consente di filtrare i nodi in base al nome.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the current node is returned as part of the iteration or filtered out.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>che indica se il nodo corrente viene restituito come parte dell'iterazione o filtrato.</xref:System.Boolean>
Restituisce lo spostamento del risultato corrente.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato del navigatore cambia solo se il <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.MoveNext%2A>metodo ha restituito `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator on the next descendant node.
trans-unit.target: Posiziona l'iteratore sul nodo discendente successivo.

trans-unit.source: If the next descendant node exists, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se il successivo nodo discendente esiste, il metodo MoveNext imposta il <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.Current%2A>proprietà spostamento del risultato corrente; in caso contrario, il <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.Current%2A>proprietà rimane invariata.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.DescendantIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the next descendant node exists; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se è presente il successivo nodo discendente. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
